column5: Best suited for corporate executives and business travelers.  A cozy private suite in a beautiful home and upscale neighborhood on junction of Plano, Frisco, McKinney, Allen. 5minute drive to Hwy 121 and 10minute to Hwy 75 or DNT travel anywhere within Dallas metroplex.  Can add a portable mattress for a party of more than 2, but let us know before the booking.
column8: A cozy bedroom and exclusive bath in a family home
